data.actual_result: Voice chat bubble will appear always on, but *only* when sensitivity is at -100dB
data.expected_result: Voice chat bubble will only illuminate when it is actually receiving input
data.short_description: issues with mic input showing as always broadcasting, even if no audio is picked up - for client and other users in voice
data.steps_to_repro: - Use any kind of input for voice that doesn't actually broadcast audio (or has some kind of hardware mute) - Insure that mic input sensitivity is manually set to -100dB - The bubble in voice should appear illuminated.  Note that having a sensitivty of -99dB will work as expected.
